contest-event.event-date:
June 6, 1891 D Rotherham Contest
Rotherham Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
rotherham-contest
None
Old College Grounds, Masbrough Promoted by Rotherham Borough Temperance Band Open to all bands not having won more than £12 in 1890 or 1891 Prizes: £16 16s, £12 7s, £4 Quickstep: 1. Brighouse, 2. Dannemora. 5 bands competed
Feb. 6, 2013, 5:50 p.m. Feb. 2, 2018, 4:10 p.m.
1 Brighouse Subscription George Fred Birkenshaw Meyerbeer's Works [unknown arranger]
2 Cleckheaton Victoria Hugh Whitham Weber Fantasia [arr. Gladney]
3 Woodhouse Prize Band Fenton Renshaw Selection from Weber [arr. Round]
4 Dannemora Steelworks W. H. Hepworth Verdi [arr. Round]
5 Sheffield Temperance John Davison Selection from Weber [arr. Round]
